title: Rhythm Of The Rain (聽見下雨的聲音)
lyrics: Zhu li shang ting liu zhe qing ting Po li ping li cha man xiao xiao sen lin Qing chun nen li de hen xian ming Bai ye chuang zhe she de guang yin Xiang you zhe xin shi de yi zhang biao qing Er ni di tou chai xin, Xiang zhi dao guan yu wo de shi qing Qing tai ru jing, yan xia feng ling, yao huang ceng jing Hui yi shi yi hang hang cong jian jie de feng jing, ai shi xhong nian qing Er wo ting jian xia yu de sheng yin Xiang qi yong chun yu shuo ai qing Xing fu ye ke yi hen an jing Wo fu chu yi zhi hen xiao xin Zong yu ting jian xia yu de sheng yin Yu shi wo de shi jie bei chao xing Jiu pa qing xu ku hong le yan jing Bu she de lei zai bi ci de lian shang tou ming Bai ye chuang zhe she de guang yin Xiang you zhe xin shi de yi zhang biao qing Er ni di tou chai xin, Xiang zhi dao guan yu wo de shi qing Ai zai guo jing yuan fen bu ting, shui zai dan xin Chuang tai xia di luo de yu di qing qiao zhe shang xin, qi mei er dong ting Er wo ting jian xia yu de sheng yin Xiang qi yong chun yu shuo ai qing Xing fu ye ke yi hen an jing Wo fu chu yi zhi hen xiao xin Zong yu ting jian xia yu de sheng yin Yu shi wo de shi jie bei chao xing Jiu pa qing xu ku hong le yan jing Bu she de lei zai bi ci de lian shang tou ming
